name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力, 並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。
schedule:
W1 September 10,	Orientation
W2 September 17, Writing a Paragraph, Topic Sentence
W4 October 1, Narration, Subject-Verb Agreement, AWL 1
W5 October 8, Narration, Subject-Verb Agreement, AWL 1
W6 October 15, Description, Articles, AWL 1
W7 October 22, Description, Articles, AWL 2
W8 October 29, Writing an Essay, Number, AWL 2
W9 November 5, Example, Number, AWL 2
W10 November 12, Example, Word Choice, AWL 3
W11 November 19, Process, Word Choice, AWL 3
W12 November 26, Process. Word Forms, AWL 3
W13 December 3, Cause-Effect, Word Forms, AWL 4
W14 December 10, Cause-Effect, Prepositions, AWL 4
W15 December 17, Comparison-Contrast, Prepositions, AWL 4
W16 December 24, Comparison-Contrast, Grammar Test
W18 January 7, Paper Due
END
scorePolicy:
Homework: 20
Homework revisions: 20
Vocabulary homework: 20 (to be explained)
Grammar exam: 20 (December 24)
Final paper: 20 (to be explained)
materials: TBA on first day of class
